en.partners.title: Our Partners
en.partners.subtitle: Working together to promote dance culture
en.partners.intro.description: We are proud to collaborate with these wonderful organizations and individuals who help us spread the joy of forró in Prague.
en.partners.venues.kps.title: KPS Michov
en.partners.venues.kps.description: A multi-purpose community space that hosts our regular classes and events. A welcoming venue with a great dance floor and atmosphere.
en.partners.venues.dorado.title: Dorado Coffee
en.partners.venues.dorado.description: A cozy café with space for smaller events and workshops. Perfect for intimate gatherings and practice sessions.
en.partners.teachers.emilson.name: Emilson Bernardes
en.partners.teachers.emilson.title: Brazilian Forró Master
en.partners.teachers.emilson.description: Professional dancer and instructor from Brazil with over 20 years of experience teaching forró around the world. Emilson brings authentic techniques and joy to every class.
en.partners.teachers.emilson.specialization: Forró Pé de Serra, Xote, Baião
en.partners.teachers.emilson.achievement: Founder of Forró Festivals across Europe
en.partners.teachers.zuzana_olga.name: Zuzana & Olga
en.partners.teachers.zuzana_olga.descriptio: Local teachers who organize regular classes and workshops. They focus on proper technique, connection between partners, and creating a friendly learning environment.
en.partners.teachers.others.title: Guest Teachers
en.partners.teachers.others.description: We regularly host renowned teachers from across Europe and Brazil for special workshops and events.
en.partners.teachers.carlos_fernanda.name: Carlos & Fernanda
en.partners.teachers.andre.name: André Negrão
en.partners.band.tres_coracoes.title: Três Corações
en.partners.band.tres_coracoes.description: A local band playing traditional Brazilian forró music. The band consists of talented musicians who create an authentic atmosphere at our events.
en.partners.band.devail.name: Devanil Santos
en.partners.others.camoes.title: Instituto Camões
en.partners.others.camoes.description: The Portuguese cultural institute that supports Portuguese language and culture events in Prague. They occasionally sponsor our Brazilian cultural initiatives.

es.partners.title: Nuestros Socios
es.partners.subtitle: Trabajando juntos para promover la cultura del baile
es.partners.intro.description: Estamos orgullosos de colaborar con estas maravillosas organizaciones e individuos que nos ayudan a difundir la alegría del forró en Praga.

pt.partners.title: Nossos Parceiros
pt.partners.subtitle: Trabalhando juntos para promover a cultura da dança
pt.partners.intro.description: Temos orgulho de colaborar com estas maravilhosas organizações e indivíduos que nos ajudam a espalhar a alegria do forró em Praga.

sk.partners.title: Naši partneri
sk.partners.subtitle: Spolupracujeme na podpore tanečnej kultúry
sk.partners.intro.description: Sme hrdí na spoluprácu s týmito úžasnými organizáciami a jednotlivcami, ktorí nám pomáhajú šíriť radosť z forra v Prahe.

ua.partners.title: Наші партнери
ua.partners.subtitle: Працюємо разом для просування танцювальної культури
ua.partners.no_partners: В даний час шукаємо нові партнерства
ua.partners.intro.description: Ми пишаємося співпрацею з цими чудовими організаціями та людьми, які допомагають нам поширювати радість форро в Празі.
